description: Following the application of updates related to CVE-2024-38132, users may experience complete service unavailability related to Windows Network Address Translation (NAT). This denial of service can impact multiple Windows versions, including Windows 11 Version 24H2 (10.0.26100.1457) and Windows Server 2016, alongside several others noted with associated KB Articles such as KB5041571, KB5041585, and KB5041782. Affected users might find that they are unable to establish new network connections or maintain existing sessions, leading to a significant disruption in service continuity across their network environments. This behavior can manifest intermittently or persistently, depending on the conditions triggered post-update, severely limiting the availability of network resources during the outage period.
